title: The Friday Letter Archive
description: An archive of the University of Idaho President's communications, including the Friday Letter, memos, reports, videos, and presentations originally published on the website of the Office of the President.

title: University of Idaho Library Archive-It
description: The Library uses the Archive-It web archiving platform to capture authentic digital records for long-term preservation and access. Some curated harvests are cataloged in our portal. All captured content is discoverable via the Internet Archive Wayback Machine.

title: Terry Abraham Web Archive
description: The Terry Abraham Web Archive preserves the writing, scholarship, and resources of Terry Abraham that were originally published on University of Idaho's early websites.

title: University of Idaho News Archive
description: Web archive that captured U of I News content in 2015 before the university migrated their website platform.

title: First Monday Newsletter Archive
description: Items harvested in 2015 to ensure continued access to the unique content of the College of Law newsletter, First Monday.
